long_description: With low weight and high style, the women's PRO-TEC Kensington snow helmet comfortably guards your noggin from impacts and keeps you looking sharp while skiing or boarding the fluffy white stuff. In-mold construction fuses a light polycarbonate shell with an impact-absorbing EPS foam liner, providing optimal protection and low-profile style without excess weight. Wind Shield technology allows goggles to rest inside a channel on the helmet liner, blocking cold air and sealing the gap between your goggles and helmet. Dri-Lex comfort liner and generously padded, soft-cupping earpads are detachable in warmer weather. Active Venting system lets you adjust the amount of cool air entering the helmet. Recco(R) Avalance Rescue System-equipped helmet works with advanced radar technology to allow quick location in the event of an avalanche. The PRO-TEC Kensington snow helmet is compatible with audio systems (sold separately). This snow helmet complies with ASTM F 2040 and/or CE EN 1077 alpine ski and snowboard helmet safety standards.
short_description: With low weight and high style, the women's PRO-TEC Kensington snow helmet comfortably guards your noggin from impacts and keeps you looking sharp while skiing or boarding the fluffy white stuff.
